text: Avelino Méndez Rangel (26 November 1958 - 25 January 2021) was a Mexican politician. He was a member of the Party of the Democratic Revolution. From 2009 to 2012, he was a federal deputy representing the Federal District. He also was borough mayor in Xochimilco. Méndez Rangel died in Mexico City on 25 January 2021 after being hospitalized with COVID-19 days earlier, during the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico, aged 62. ==References== Category:1958 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Mexico City Category:Politicians from Mexico City
title: Avelino Méndez Rangel
